welcome.title: Welcome, {firstName}!
welcome.heroSubtitle: Beswib, your marketplace for race bibs

welcome.nextStep3: List a bib in minutes with secure payments

marketplace.title: Explore the marketplace
marketplace.description: Discover available bibs for your next races. Filter by distance, location, and date.

profile.title: Complete your profile
profile.description: Add your information to facilitate your bib purchases and sales.

sell.title: Sell your bibs
sell.description: Can't participate in a race anymore? Resell your bib in just a few clicks.

community.title: Join the community
community.description: Discover events and connect with other passionate runners.

bibApproval.subject: Congratulations! Your bib has been approved üéâ
bibApproval.mainMessage: Great news! The event organizer has approved your bib.
bibApproval.canNowSell: You can now list it for sale on Beswib.
bibApproval.step1: Your bib is now visible on the marketplace
bibApproval.step2: Interested runners can now discover it
bibApproval.step3: You'll receive a notification as soon as a buyer shows interest
bibApproval.step4: Payment will be secured through our platform
bibApproval.helpDescription: Our team is here to support you through the selling process.

purchaseApproval.subject: All set! Your purchase has been validated üéâ
purchaseApproval.mainMessage: Great news! The organizer has validated the ownership change of your bib.
purchaseApproval.readyToRun: You are officially registered and ready to run!
purchaseApproval.step2: You will soon receive your pre-race instructions
purchaseApproval.step4: Check the event website for more details
purchaseApproval.tip2: Review the course and aid stations
purchaseApproval.helpDescription: Our support team is here to help you.

purchaseConfirmation.subject: Congratulations! Your purchase has been confirmed
purchaseConfirmation.title: Purchase Confirmed!
purchaseConfirmation.subtitle: Your bib is waiting for you!
purchaseConfirmation.feeExplanation: Platform fees are 10% of the listing price. PayPal fees are provided by PayPal and may vary by country and payment method.
purchaseConfirmation.congratulations: Congratulations {buyerName}! Your purchase has been confirmed successfully. You are now registered for this exceptional event!
purchaseConfirmation.step1: Contact the organizer for bib pickup details
purchaseConfirmation.step2: Prepare for the race with our training tips
purchaseConfirmation.step3: Track your purchases in your buyer dashboard
purchaseConfirmation.step4: Join our community to share your experience

saleConfirmation.subject: Congratulations! Your bib has been sold
saleConfirmation.title: Sale Confirmed!
saleConfirmation.subtitle: Your bib has found a new runner
saleConfirmation.congratulations: Congratulations {sellerName}! Your bib has been sold successfully. The amount will be credited to your PayPal account within 24-48h.
saleConfirmation.step1: Payment will be processed automatically via PayPal
saleConfirmation.step2: You will receive a notification once the transfer is completed
saleConfirmation.step3: Check your seller dashboard for more details
